characters.name: Raku Ichijou
characters.description:
**Height:** 168 cm

Son of a Yakuza family. He's intelligent but not an adept fighter. He likes sweet things, wants to marry a Yamato Nadeshiko and says he's the kind of person who has to do it absolutely correctly when he puts his mind into something otherwise he can't be satisfied.

characters.name: Chitoge Kirisaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm

The main female protagonist of the series. She is the daughter of [Adelt Wogner Kirisaki](https://anilist.co/character/82935) and [Hana Kirisaki](https://anilist.co/character/84919) who served as the fake girlfriend of [Raku Ichijou](https://anilist.co/character/48393) for the next three years of her school life to prevent a war from starting between their families.

Chitoge is somewhat a forgetful, stern and bold girl. However, once someone gets to know her better, she becomes very talkative and nice. Similar to Raku, Chitoge is the type to go out of her way to help someone. For example, when Raku lost his pendant once again from the chain being broken, Chitoge had secretly gotten the Beehive gang to help fix it for him and gave it back later that night. Chitoge is somewhat oblivious when it comes to love and others' love interests, for example, how she didn't know what [Seishirou Tsugumi](https://anilist.co/character/58885)’s "symptoms" were, which were actually love. She is also very athletic as she can easily jump over the school's walls and swim the length of the school pool in a couple of seconds. Ever since she was a child she had a hard time making friends as they disliked her. As a result, she had a cold demeanor toward people at the start of the series due to her relationship with her family. This led her to create notebooks filled with information on classmates in an attempt to make friends. When Chitoge had lost her ribbon, she becomes very emotional and sad, wanting to find the ribbon very badly. Unlike her usual self, when [Marika Tachibana](https://anilist.co/character/66597) insulted her for caring so much about a ribbon, she cried innocently, scaring the girl into speaking in her accent and helping in finding the ribbon. Raku also noted that she felt more womanly as Chitoge was meek and quite happy when he tried to buy a replacement ribbon for her and when she hugged him for finding her actual ribbon, but prefers her usual self better. It should be noted that she treasured the ribbon for two key reasons: because her mother gave it to her, and secondly because Raku told her when they were young that it would look good on her.
~!In the end of the manga it is shown that Chitoge became a fashion designer and she and Raku got married.!~

characters.name: Kosaki Onodera
characters.description:
**Height:** 157 cm

She is one of the main characters in the manga series Nisekoi. She is shown to have a crush on [Raku Ichijou](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou), the male protagonist of Nisekoi, and is also the only girl that Raku openly has feelings for.

Kosaki is discreet, innocent, and slightly timid. She is very kind, she takes care of Raku when he is wounded or ill. Generally, she opts to think carefully before acting, as seen when she stalls her confession to Raku in consideration that he may have feelings for [Chitoge](https://anilist.co/character/48391/Chitoge-Kirisaki).  

In confrontation with Raku, Kosaki displays inconfidence, initially needing encouragement from [Ruri](https://anilist.co/character/58281/Ruri-Miyamoto) attempt confessing her love.  

Kosaki works well with her classmates, possessing close friends and being the most popular girl for the boys before Chitoge transferred and after Kosaki and Raku allegedly began dating.   

Both Kosaki and Raku are completely unaware that the feelings they hold for each other are mutual. Like in many average fictional love stories, these two try not to show their feelings to each other. She loves Raku because he is kind and caring. Just like the other girls who like him, she can be jealous as well but not to the point of having bloodlust. She often worries/wonders whether Raku and Chitoge's "fake relationship" is actually developing into something more than just that. 

Chitoge and Kosaki have a really trusting relationship. It can even be considered that they are best friends since Chitoge only tells her problems to her (except in some cases, Raku as well). Despite her knowing that Chitoge and Raku are only pretending to date, she at times can't help but be suspicious of their relationship. 

~!In the end of the manga, Kosaki is revealed to be The Promise Girl, who had made a promise of marriage with Raku when they were young.!~

(Source: Nisekoi Wikia)

characters.name: Marika Tachibana
characters.description:
**Height:** 152 cm

Marika transfers to [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou)'s class and is introduced as his fiancée; she bears a key that she thinks will unlock Raku's pendant, and is the most vocal about expressing her love to Raku. She is the daughter of the police chief, and has been in love with Raku for the past ten years. She does not get along with [Chitoge](https://anilist.co/character/48391/Chitoge-Kirisaki); she states she hates girls with long hair despite the fact that she also has long hair. She has a frail constitution; ten years prior, she was frequently visited by a young Raku, who brought her gifts and sparked a friendship with her. She used to speak in a rather vulgar manner but has attempted to correct her language after Raku had told her that he likes a girly girl with long hair. However, when flustered, she reverts to her old speaking habits.

characters.name: Seishirou Tsugumi
characters.description:
**Height:** 165 cm

Tsugumi is a hitwoman who was raised and trained by [Claude](https://anilist.co/character/82933/Claude-Ringheart) of the Beehive Gangsters. Tsugumi is originally introduced as a guy who transfers to [Chitoge](https://anilist.co/character/48391/Chitoge-Kirisaki)'s class, and has orders to protect her from [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou), whom she thinks forced Chitoge into the relationship. She and Chitoge are childhood friends; she tries to keep a ten year old promise of becoming strong to protect Chitoge. However, after Raku treats her nicely, she begins to develop some feelings for him, even though she is too stubborn and embarrassed to admit it. In America, her assassin code name is "Black Tiger", who had a rivalry with "White Fang". She does well academically, having ranked next to Chitoge on a yearly exam.

characters.name: Shuu Maiko
characters.description:
**Height:** 174 cm

Although Shuu appears to be playful, he is actually very sensitive. He was the first one who realized that [Chitoge](https://anilist.co/character/48391/Chitoge-Kirisaki) and [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou) were not actually dating. Also, he was the only one who seemed to realize that [Tsugumi](https://anilist.co/character/58885/Seishirou-Tsugumi) was a girl, though he hid the thought and decided to play along just for his own amusement. Also, it should be noted that Shuu is the kind of person that would do almost anything for a laugh. Best friend of Raku Ichijou.

characters.name: Ruri Miyamoto
characters.description:
**Height:** 145 cm

She is [Kosaki](https://anilist.co/character/52723/Kosaki-Onodera)'s friend. She supports Kosaki's love for [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou), often giving her a push from behind to take the next step forward. Also beats up Shu for his perverted comments.
~!She fell in love with Shu later on in the series and eventually confessed to him. She also said that she will wait for Shu to get over his feelings for Kyoko. In the final chapter it is shown that she is now working as a translator and living with Shu.!~

characters.name: Claude Ringheart
characters.description:
**Height:** 190 cm

Claude is one of the leaders of the Bee Hive Gangsters, and one of the few characters who suspects the relationship between [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou) and [Chitoge](https://anilist.co/character/48391/Chitoge-Kirisaki) is fake. He stalks Chitoge regularly to make sure Raku does not take advantage of her. Chitoge stated that when she was young, she was unable to make friends because of Claude's over-protectiveness and background checks. He raises [Tsugumi](https://anilist.co/character/58885/Seishirou-Tsugumi) as a hitman, and appears to be clueless as to her gender, having given her a boy's name, Seshirou.

characters.name: Adelt Wogner Kirisaki
alt_names: アーデルト 桐崎 ウォグナー
characters.description:
**Height:** 192 cm

[Chitoge](https://anilist.co/character/48391/Chitoge-Kirisaki)'s father and husband of [Hana](https://anilist.co/character/84919/Hana-Kirisaki). Adel is an old friend of the father of [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou) despite disagreements between of the Yakuza and Mafia.

characters.name: Ryuunosuke Sasaki
characters.description:
**Height:** 188 cm

He is the head member of the Shuei-Gumi Clan much like Claude is of the Bee Hive Gang.

characters.name: Kyouko Nichihara
characters.description:
**Height:** 169 cm

English teacher of first year, class C. She has appeared since the first story. A rough character.

characters.name: Gen Tachibana
characters.description:
**Height:** 195 cm

He is the father of [Marika Tachibana](https://anilist.co/character/66597/Marika-Tachibana) and holds the highest rank in the Police Department.

characters.name: Nanako Onodera
characters.description:
**Height:** 173 cm

Mother of [Haru](https://anilist.co/character/84911/Haru-Onodera) and [Kosaki](https://anilist.co/character/52723/Kosaki-Onodera). She is also the owner of the Onodera Sweets Shop.

characters.name: Shinobu Honda
characters.description:
Honda is Marika's personal attendant and police escort. She monitors Marika and at times advises her to not overexert herself due to her frail condition.
~!In chapter 195, it is revealed that her name before gaining her title as a shinobu is Youko.!~

characters.name: Issei Ichijou
characters.description:
__Height__: 163 cm

He is the former boss of the Shuei-Gumi Clan, and the father of [Raku](https://anilist.co/character/48393/Raku-Ichijou).
